thread.title: philippe starck X designboom instagram takeover during milan design week!
thread.title_full: philippe starck X designboom instagram takeover during milan design week!

author: natasha kwok I designboom
title: philippe starck X designboom instagram takeover during milan design week!
text:
philippe starck X designboom instagram takeover during milan design week! 


have you ever wondered what a designer’s day during milan design week is like ? well, now is your chance to find out! 

on tuesday april 4th, internationally-acclaimed designer philippe starck will takeover the designboom instagram account to give our 1.1 million followers an exclusive guide through his very first day — as it happens. experience snippets of starck’s schedule as he makes his way through the city and visits the most exciting exhibitions, installations, parties and more. from the bustling atmosphere of the fairgrounds, to exclusive boutiques and showrooms around milan, follow starck’s journey as he navigates the most important design event of the year. 

a LIVE Q&A will take place at 1:00PM, when starck will answer your questions directly from the fair. make sure to send your questions at 1:00PM through our facebook , instagram and comments section below. 

follow @designboom for the #starckXdesignboom instagram takeover on tuesday, april 4 2017. 
Save
